paramInformation.label: Minimum brightness level
paramInformation.description: Set the desired value from 1 to 98% for the minimum dim level that the dimmer is restricted to, the dimmer will not go lower than the value set here.

paramInformation.label: Maximum brightness level
paramInformation.description: Set the desired value from 2 to 99% for the maximum dim level that the dimmer is restricted to, the dimmer will not go higher than the value set here.

paramInformation.label: Automatic control - dimming step size
paramInformation.description: This parameter defines the percentage value of dimming step during the automatic control.

paramInformation.label: Automatic control - time of a dimming step
paramInformation.description: This parameter defines the time of single dimming step set in parameter 3 during the automatic control.

paramInformation.label: Manual control - dimming step size
paramInformation.description: This parameter defines the percentage value of dimming step during the manual control.

paramInformation.label: Manual control - time of a dimming step
paramInformation.description: This parameter defines the time of single dimming step setin parameter 5 during the manual control.

paramInformation.label: Switch type
paramInformation.description: Choose between momentary, ON/OFF and roller blind switch. Available settings: 0 – momentary (Push) switch. 1 – ON/OFF switch. 2– roller blind switch-two switches operate the device(S1 to brighter, S2 to dim

options.label: roller blind switch-two switches operate the device(S1 to brighter, S2 to dim)

paramInformation.label: Switch functionality of S1 and S2
paramInformation.description: Set the desired value from 0 to 1 to turn on/off the memory function. Setting this value to 0 turns off the dimmer's Memory function. Setting this value to 1 turns on the dimmer's Memory function.

options.label: S1 operates as S2, S2 operates as S1

paramInformation.label: S1 Scene ID set
paramInformation.description: When you press S1 five times,the light is dimmed to the brightness set in Scene ID 3 . S1 Scene ID is set by this configuration. Note: The actual action of each SCENE ID are set by SCE-NE_ACTUATOR_CONF(0x26) command.

paramInformation.label: S2 Scene ID set
paramInformation.description: When you press S1 five times,the light is dimmed to the brightness set in Scene ID 5. S2 Scene ID is set by this configuration. Note: The actual action of each SCENE ID are set by SCE-NE_ACTUATOR_CONF(0x26) command.
